## LightModel.fillSurfaceData() method

Initial fill the surface data of current fragment

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected fillSurfaceData(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, envLight: EnvironmentLighting): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |
|  envLight | [EnvironmentLighting](doc/markdown/./scene.environmentlighting.md) | The environment lighting object |
